reviews.text: We have stayed at this hotel on several occasions. Each of our stays was for one night. Check in and out has always gone smoothly with no problems. The rooms have always been clean. Very clean and large bathroom. The beds are comfortable. (I normally sleep on a waterbed, so most hotel beds are pretty uncomfortable for me which causes me to wake up every hour or so during the night..... that was NOT the case at this hotel..... I slept well.) The breakfast buffet has always been well stocked. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Clean and adequate

likes.disliked: — the entrance is not very well marked from the road

reviews.title: Many stays no problems
reviews.text: I have stayed at this sleep in 4 times in the past 2 years I stay for 1 to 2 nights each trip. The rooms were always clean. The breakfast was plentyful and good. The staff was very nice. The only issue I ever had was one time the outside door's key reader didn't work most of the time. I didn't like getting locked out and having to walk around. But, everything else was fine!

reviews.title: Better check your charge card
reviews.text: Our problem was not with the room but with the charge bill and problems after we got home.

reviews.title: Not child friendly
reviews.text: I tried to call the hotel and tell them there was an excessive charge of $50 on our credit card. The girl who answered the phone hung up on me three times. Finally when I called the fourth time, I ask and she gave me a name.

reviews.title: Nice Family Hotel
reviews.text: Finally we talk to the hotel manager, Mohammad and he tells us the extra charge was for blankets we took. I offer to take a lie detector test and he says he isn't interested in that. He refuses to remove the charge. So I ask him about the girl who answered the phone in the lobby there. He says the girl by that name hasn't worked there for two weeks.

reviews.title: Unfortunate disappointments
reviews.text: Good choice for the money if you are not staying for more than 2 nights. The pool area was dirty the whole time were were there. Housekeeping did not clean our room in a timely manner. We left at 9:30 am for a family outing, returned at 1:30 pm, housekeeping was just starting to clean our room.

I have been traveling to Ft Wayne quite a bit for business lately and I have been able to get good deals at nice hotels (Hampton, Hilton Garden, etc). But the last time I wanted to book a stay, the rates were up quite a bit over my expense limit. So I started looking around for a new place to stay that was a bit cheaper.
reviews.title: Unexpectedly great value!
